data.text: @girlsreallyrule @voguemagazine How could she have possibly known when all the leading ladies from his films were forced to wear Marchesa gowns to premiers and award shows?

@girlsreallyrule @voguemagazine You know, when I heard the rumors about Harvey waaay back when, making his latest ‘it girls’ wear Marchesa was part of the story. I am not Team Chapman because I cannot fathom how she had no idea of his inappropriateness, but I empathize with her and the kids nonetheless.
@girlsreallyrule @voguemagazine That guy was so punching above his weight.
@girlsreallyrule @voguemagazine I am so curious about this.  Thanks for posting.
